name: Galarian Meowth
description: Living with a savage, seafaring people has toughened this Pokémon’s body so much that parts of it have turned to iron.

abilities.name: Evolution Roar
abilities.effect: You must discard 2 cards from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Galarian Perrserker, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
